name: MoonBall
description:
MOONBALL

Challenge your friends on the best Esport game of the year: MoonBall !!

The rules are simple: send the ball on your opponent lower his hp to the minimum and eject him from YOUR moon (you saw it first). 

Beware of the lunar cycle. These have sometimes... unexpected effects.

Note :  If you don't have someone to play with in your house you can play "online" by using a tool like Parsec !

PRESS JUMP TO START! 

Controls:  

Controller (XBOX)

Ball Up: Y

Ball Mid: X

Ball: B

Move/Crouch: Left Joystick

Jump: A

Dash: RB

Keyboard (QWERTY) :    

Ball Up: Z

Ball Mid: X

Ball: C

Move/Jump/Crouch: Arrows

Dash: Space bar

Note: All bugs are illusions. Don't pay too much attention.
